label: Send Email
name: emailSend
description: Send email to single or multiple receipients

inputParameters.label: To Email
inputParameters.name: toEmail
inputParameters.description: Email address of the recipient. Multiple emails can be comma-separated.

inputParameters.label: CC Email
inputParameters.name: ccEmail
inputParameters.description: Email address of CC recipient. Multiple emails can be comma-separated.

inputParameters.label: Ignore SSL
inputParameters.name: ignoreSSL
inputParameters.description: Send email regardless of SSL validation.
